mapper.insert: insert into t_customer(chinese_name, chinese_name_pinyin, english_name, gender, phone_num, wechat_num, qq_num, email, office_address, house_address, customer_value, birthday, hobby, created_user_id, project_id, module_id, task_id, discuss_stage_id) values (#{chineseName}, #{chineseNamePinyin}, #{englishName}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{wechatNum}, #{qqNum}, #{email}, #{officeAddress}, #{houseAddress}, #{customerValue}, #{birthday}, #{hobby}, #{createdUserId}, #{projectId}, #{moduleId}, #{taskId}, #{discussStageId})
mapper.select: update t_customer set chinese_name = #{chineseName}, chinese_name_pinyin = #{chineseNamePinyin}, english_name = #{englishName}, gender = #{gender}, phone_num = #{phone}, wechat_num = #{wechatNum}, qq_num = #{qqNum}, email = #{email}, office_address = #{officeAddress}, house_address = #{houseAddress}, customer_value = #{customerValue}, birthday = #{birthday}, hobby = #{hobby}, project_id = #{projectId}, module_id = #{moduleId}, task_id = #{taskId}, discuss_stage_id = #{discussStageId} where id = #{id}

select c.*, d.name as discuss_stage_name, u.chinese_name as created_user_chinese_name, u.english_name as created_user_english_name from t_customer c left join t_discuss_stage d on c.discuss_stage_id = d.id left join t_user u on c.created_user_id = u.id where c.id = #{customerId}

select c.id, c.chinese_name, c.english_name, c.discuss_stage_id, p.name as project_name, t.name as task_name from t_customer c left join t_project p on c.project_id = p.id left join t_task t on c.task_id = t.id where c.created_user_id = #{userId} order by c.english_name

select c.id, c.chinese_name, c.english_name, c.discuss_stage_id, p.name as project_name, t.name as task_name from t_customer c left join t_customer_user cu on cu.customer_id = c.id
left join t_project p on c.project_id = p.id left join t_task t on c.task_id = t.id where cu.user_id = #{userId} order by c.english_name

select c.id, c.chinese_name, c.english_name, p.name as project_name, c.discuss_stage_id, t.name as task_name from t_customer c left join t_customer_user cu on cu.customer_id = c.id
left join t_project p on c.project_id = p.id left join t_task t on c.task_id = t.id where c.discuss_stage_id = #{discussStageId} and c.created_user_id = #{userId} order by english_name

select c.id, c.chinese_name, c.english_name, c.discuss_stage_id, p.name as project_name, t.name as task_name from t_customer c left join t_customer_user cu on cu.customer_id = c.id
left join t_project p on c.project_id = p.id left join t_task t on c.task_id = t.id where c.discuss_stage_id = #{discussStageId} and cu.user_id = #{userId} order by english_name

select c.id, c.chinese_name, c.english_name, p.name as project_name, t.name as task_name from t_customer c left join t_customer_user cu on cu.customer_id = c.id
left join t_project p on c.project_id = p.id left join t_task t on c.task_id = t.id where (c.created_user_id = #{userId} or cu.user_id = #{userId}) and (english_name like "%"#{str}"%" or chinese_name_pinyin like "%"#{str}"%" or chinese_name like "%"#{str}"%") ;
